Package ir.mehran1022.api

Class PottySnake

java.lang.Object
ir.mehran1022.api.PottySnake
public final class PottySnake extends Object
A simple library for managing YAML files using SnakeYAML.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Mehran1022

  • Constructor Details

    • PottySnake

      public PottySnake(String filePath) throws IOException
      Public constructor
      Throws:
      IOException

  • Method Details

    • load

      public void load() throws IOException
      Loads the YAML content from the specified file path into the data map. This method reads the file content as a string and uses the SnakeYAML library to parse it into a map. If the file content is not in a valid YAML format, the parser may throw an exception.
      Throws:
      IOException - If there is an issue reading the file, such as if the file does not exist or is not accessible.

    • save

      public void save() throws IOException
      Saves the current data map content into the YAML file at the specified file path. This method converts the map into a YAML-formatted string using the SnakeYAML library and writes it to the file. If there are issues during writing to the file, such as lack of write permissions or disk space, an IOException may be thrown.
      Throws:
      IOException - If there is an issue writing to the file.

    • getEntry

      public Object getEntry(String key)
      Retrieves an entry from the YAML data.
      Parameters:
      key - The key for the entry, which can be a simple or nested key.
      Returns:
      The value of the entry, or null if not found.

    • setEntry

      public void setEntry(String key, Object value)
      Adds or updates an entry in the YAML data.
      Parameters:
      key - The key for the entry, which can be a simple or nested key.
      value - The value to set for the entry.

    • removeEntry

      public void removeEntry(String key)
      Removes an entry from the YAML data.
      Parameters:
      key - The key for the entry, which can be a simple or nested key.

    • createSection

      public void createSection(String section)
      Creates a new section in the YAML data. If the section already exists, it will be overwritten.
      Parameters:
      section - The section key, which can be a simple or nested key.

    • hasSection

      public boolean hasSection(String section)
      Checks if a section exists in the YAML data.
      Parameters:
      section - The section key, which can be a simple or nested key.
      Returns:
      true if the section exists, false otherwise.

    • renameSection

      public void renameSection(String oldSection, String newSection)
      Renames a section in the YAML data.
      Parameters:
      oldSection - The current section key.
      newSection - The new section key.
